code: import"./ExpenseDate.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ExpenseDate=function ExpenseDate(data){/*the constant below basically holds the logic of display the month in the date*/var dateMonth=data.date.toLocaleString("en-US",{month:"short"});/*the constant below basically holds the logic of display the day in the date*/var dateDay=data.date.toLocaleString("en-US",{day:"2-digit"});/*the constant below basically holds the logic of display the year in the date*/var dateYear=data.date.getFullYear();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"expense-date",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"expense-date__month",children:dateMonth}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"expense-date__day",children:dateDay}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"expense-date__year",children:dateYear})]});};export default ExpenseDate;
